name: Screen Size Tester - Automator Automation
description:
Use this automation to quickly test out any of your designs for different mobile sizes. In addition it also creates a component of your screen so that you can test our live changes in constraints and designs.


[An automation using the Automator plugin]


Steps to get started:

  • Install the automator plugin from Diagram.
  • Download the json and import by clicking the settings icon in automator.
  • Select the example ‚ÄúYour Design‚Äù frame and click play to run the automation.


How it works?

  • Creates a component of the selected screen
  • Creates instances of the created component so that you can test out changes live on the different screen sizes.
